thread.title: Miss G
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Miss G

author: Miss G
title: Miss G
text: Found a lovely coat in another store and after a bit of research managed to get for a whole Â£50 cheaper with LD Mountain. I was not in for delivery 2 days after order, so requested it to be sent to a local shop with no problems at all. Will definitely be recommending LD Mountain Centre. Great prices, quick delivery and fabulous service.
